name: .CHROMAEFFECTS File Extension
summary: Learn about .CHROMAEFFECTS files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open a CHROMAEFFECTS file in Synapse 3 Chroma Studio (Windows). Doing so will allow you to adjust the color and pattern settings your CHROMAEFFECTS file contains. Remember, you cannot open CHROMAEFFECTS files in earlier versions of Synapse.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
